body_html: Just for point of reference, renting a K40 or K80 is not actually prohibitively expensive. Amazon doesn't have them, but several of the options on http://www.nvidia.com/object/gpu-cloud-computing-services.html do. (Some for as low as like 3$/hr)
body_text: Just for point of reference, renting a K40 or K80 is not actually prohibitively expensive.  Amazon doesn't have them, but several of the options on http://www.nvidia.com/object/gpu-cloud-computing-services.html do.  (Some for as low as like 3$/hr)
body: Just for point of reference, renting a K40 or K80 is not actually prohibitively expensive.  Amazon doesn't have them, but several of the options on http://www.nvidia.com/object/gpu-cloud-computing-services.html do.  (Some for as low as like 3$/hr)
